categories: Category:Star Wars: The High Republic story arcs

nodes.text: Star Wars: The High Republic: Heart of the Drengir

Star Wars: The High Republic: Heart of the Drengir is the second and current story arc of Marvel Comics' ongoing 2021 series Star Wars: The High Republic. The arc began with the publication of the sixth issue in the series, released on June 30, 2021 and will conclude with the release of the eighth issue on August 11, 2021.
